items.title: Show HN: AI-powered web service combining FastAPI, Pydantic-AI, and MCP servers
items.raw_excerpt:
Hey all!
I recently gave a workshop talk at PyCon Greece 2025 about building production-ready agent systems. To check the workshop, I put together a demo repo: (I will add the slides too soon in my blog: https://www.petrostechchronicles.com/ ) https://github.com/Aherontas/Pycon_Greece_2025_Presentation_... The idea was to show how multiple AI agents can collaborate using FastAPI + Pydantic-AI, with protocols like MCP (Model Context Protocol) and A2A (Agent-to-Agent) for safe communication and orchestration. Features: - Multiple agents running in containers - MCP servers (Brave search, GitHub, filesystem, etc.) as tools - A2A communication between services - Minimal UI for experimentation for Tech Trend - repo analysis I built this repo because most agent frameworks look great in isolated d

title_i18n.en: Show HN: AI-powered web service combining FastAPI, Pydantic-AI, and MCP servers
title_i18n.zh: 展示 HN：结合 FastAPI、Pydantic-AI 和 MCP 服务器的 AI 驱动网络服务
title_i18n.es: Mostrar HN: Servicio web con inteligencia artificial que combina FastAPI, Pydantic-AI y servidores MCP

excerpt_i18n.en:
Hey all!
I recently gave a workshop talk at PyCon Greece 2025 about building production-ready agent systems. To check the workshop, I put together a demo repo: (I will add the slides too soon in my blog: https://www.petrostechchronicles.com/ ) https://github.com/Aherontas/Pycon_Greece_2025_Presentation_... The idea was to show how multiple AI agents can collaborate using FastAPI + Pydantic-AI, with protocols like MCP (Model Context Protocol) and A2A (Agent-to-Agent) for safe communication and orchestration. Features: - Multiple agents running in containers - MCP servers (Brave search, GitHub, filesystem, etc.) as tools - A2A communication between services - Minimal UI for experimentation for Tech Trend - repo analysis I built this repo because most agent frameworks look great in isolated d
excerpt_i18n.zh: 大家好！我最近在PyCon希腊2025大会上做了关于构建生产级智能体系统的研讨会演讲。为配合研讨会，我创建了一个演示代码库（稍后还会在我的博客https://www.petr上分享幻灯片）。
excerpt_i18n.es:
¡Hola a todos!
Recientemente di un taller en PyCon Grecia 2025 sobre la construcción de sistemas de agentes listos para producción. Para consultar el taller, he preparado un repositorio de demostración: (también añadiré las diapositivas pronto en mi blog: https://www.petr

items.title: Show HN: From selling AI to QA teams to building a smooth test-management app
items.raw_excerpt: Hey HN, Bootstrapped founder here. I've got a bit of a story for you. We started desplega.ai to build a sophisticated AI platform that could automate E2E testing. We spent the last few months talking to dozens of QA leaders, and trying to learn what are their actual challenges. We've got one consistent feedback from large teams: their daily reality is a living hell of slow, clunky tools. We're talking about teams at major companies still managing tests on spreadsheets. Or they're stuck in a Jira instance so customized and slow you can “make a full pot of coffee” while a page loads (and that’s why they acquired arc! t3.gg said it first). On top of that, they're paying 2k/mo+!? for these tools that feel like they were designed in ‘05. Soon, it became obvious that our AI tool was way too adva

title_i18n.en: Show HN: From selling AI to QA teams to building a smooth test-management app
title_i18n.zh: 展示 HN：从向 QA 团队销售 AI 到打造流畅的测试管理应用
title_i18n.es: Mostrar HN: De vender IA a equipos de QA a crear una aplicación fluida de gestión de pruebas

excerpt_i18n.en: Hey HN, Bootstrapped founder here. I've got a bit of a story for you. We started desplega.ai to build a sophisticated AI platform that could automate E2E testing. We spent the last few months talking to dozens of QA leaders, and trying to learn what are their actual challenges. We've got one consistent feedback from large teams: their daily reality is a living hell of slow, clunky tools. We're talking about teams at major companies still managing tests on spreadsheets. Or they're stuck in a Jira instance so customized and slow you can “make a full pot of coffee” while a page loads (and that’s why they acquired arc! t3.gg said it first). On top of that, they're paying 2k/mo+!? for these tools that feel like they were designed in ‘05. Soon, it became obvious that our AI tool was way too adva
excerpt_i18n.zh: 各位HN网友，我是自主创业的创始人。想和大家分享一段经历。我们创立了desplega.ai，目标是打造一个能自动化端到端测试的先进AI平台。过去几个月里，我们与数十位质量保证团队负责人进行了深入交流。
excerpt_i18n.es: Hola HN, fundador autofinanciado aquí. Tengo una pequeña historia que contar. Empezamos desplega.ai para construir una plataforma de IA sofisticada que pudiera automatizar pruebas de extremo a extremo. Pasamos los últimos meses hablando con docenas de responsables de control de calidad.

items.title: Show HN: AutoDocs – Reduce AI costs and never manage context again
items.raw_excerpt: Hey all, Adi and Sohan here. We're building Sita ( https://trysita.com/ ), an open-source documentation generator that builds a codebase-aware knowledge graph, writes documentation for all your code, and provides an MCP server so your coding agents get precise, grounded context with citations. Run 'git clone https://github.com/TrySita/AutoDocs’ and follow our 5 minute set up in the README, and you'll have a local instance of Sita up and running. From there add your repos, use the UI to explore the dependency graph and docs, or plug into an MCP-compatible editor (Codex, Claude Code, Cursor, etc) to fetch context while you code. Check out a full demo here: https://youtu.be/S-0-9_F1AlE Before Sita, we felt stuck copy-pasting across files, Slack, and tickets, waiting several minutes while agen

title_i18n.en: Show HN: AutoDocs – Reduce AI costs and never manage context again
title_i18n.zh: HN展示：AutoDocs——降低AI成本，从此告别上下文管理
title_i18n.es: Show HN: AutoDocs – Reduce costes de IA y olvídate de gestionar el contexto para siempre

excerpt_i18n.en: Hey all, Adi and Sohan here. We're building Sita ( https://trysita.com/ ), an open-source documentation generator that builds a codebase-aware knowledge graph, writes documentation for all your code, and provides an MCP server so your coding agents get precise, grounded context with citations. Run 'git clone https://github.com/TrySita/AutoDocs’ and follow our 5 minute set up in the README, and you'll have a local instance of Sita up and running. From there add your repos, use the UI to explore the dependency graph and docs, or plug into an MCP-compatible editor (Codex, Claude Code, Cursor, etc) to fetch context while you code. Check out a full demo here: https://youtu.be/S-0-9_F1AlE Before Sita, we felt stuck copy-pasting across files, Slack, and tickets, waiting several minutes while agen
excerpt_i18n.zh: 大家好，我们是Adi和Sohan。我们正在开发Sita（https://trysita.com/），这是一款开源文档生成器，它能构建代码库感知知识图谱，为所有代码编写文档，并提供MCP服务。
excerpt_i18n.es: Hola a todos, Adi y Sohan al habla. Estamos construyendo Sita ( https://trysita.com/ ), un generador de documentación de código abierto que construye un grafo de conocimiento consciente de la base de código, escribe documentación para todo tu código y proporciona un MCP.

items.title: Launch HN: Trigger.dev (YC W23) – Open-source platform to build reliable AI apps
items.raw_excerpt: Hi HN, I’m Eric, CTO at Trigger.dev ( https://trigger.dev ). We’re a developer platform for building and running AI agents and workflows, open-source under the Apache 2.0 license ( https://github.com/triggerdotdev/trigger.dev ). We provide everything needed to create production-grade agents in your codebase and deploy, run, monitor, and debug them. You can use just our primitives or combine with tools like Mastra, LangChain and Vercel AI SDK. You can self-host or use our cloud, where we take care of scaling for you. Here’s a quick demo: ( https://youtu.be/kFCzKE89LD8 ). We started in 2023 as a way to reliably run async background jobs/workflows in TypeScript ( https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=34610686 ). Initially we didn’t deploy your code, we just orchestrated it. But we found that m

title_i18n.en: Launch HN: Trigger.dev (YC W23) – Open-source platform to build reliable AI apps
title_i18n.zh: HN发布：Trigger.dev（YC W23）——构建可靠AI应用的开源平台
title_i18n.es: Lanzamiento HN: Trigger.dev (YC W23) – Plataforma de código abierto para crear aplicaciones de IA confiables

We’re a developer platform for building and running AI agents and workflows, open-source under the Apache 2.0 license ( https://github.com/triggerdotdev/trigger.dev ). We provide everything needed to create production-grade agents in your codebase and deploy, run, monitor, and debug them. You can use just our primitives or combine with tools like Mastra, LangChain and Vercel AI SDK. You can self-host or use our cloud, where we take care of scaling for you. Here’s a quick demo: ( https://youtu.be/kFCzKE89LD8 ). We started in 2023 as a way to reliably run async background jobs/workflows in TypeScript ( https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=34610686 ). Initially we didn’t deploy your code, we just orchestrated it. But we found that m
excerpt_i18n.zh: 大家好，我是 Eric，Trigger.dev（https://trigger.dev）的首席技术官。我们是一个开发者平台，用于构建和运行 AI 智能体与工作流，采用 Apache 2.0 开源协议（https://github.com/triggerdotdev/trigge）。

items.title: 央视对谈周鸿祎：“先开枪再瞄准”！智能体时代，不懂AI就会被淘汰
items.raw_excerpt: 当下，人工智能无疑是最热门领域之一。近日，央视《读书》栏目邀请到360集团创始人周鸿祎，围绕人工智能这一核心话题展开深入交流，从日常应用到行业变革，从个人成长到国际竞争，周鸿祎的分享为公众理解AI时代提供了清晰的认知框架。 1、从大模型到智能体：AI的进化与人类的新角色 “过去人们说‘内事不决问张昭，外事不决问周瑜’，现在内外事不决其实可以问一问大模型。”周鸿祎点出了大模型在工作和生活中的核心价值。但要让大模型发挥作用，关键在于精准表达：“到了AI时代，表达能力特别重要，你说得越细节，它给的建议越有效。” 而智能体的出现，让AI从“光说不做”的聊天助理升级为“能落地干活”的数字员工。“大模型是大脑，负责规划推理；智能体是手脚，负责调用工具。”周鸿祎解释，智能体能拆解复杂任务、还有思考和规划的能力，这正是人类解决问题的核心逻辑。 随着智能体普及，人类角色将转变为AI的管理者，人来设定目标、训练模型、评估效果，因此，人的领导力和判断力会成为核心竞争力。 这种转变也带来了人与人之间能力的分化：“无视AI、不懂AI、不会管理智能体的人，注定会被淘汰。”反之，善用AI、能管理100个智能体的人将成为“超级个体”。周鸿祎强调，AI不是威胁，而是个体之间能力的放大器，能让强者更强。   2、AI的进步速度，如同“寒武纪生物大爆炸” 谈及AI的发展速度，周鸿祎用“寒武纪生物大爆炸”形容：“如今在编程、推理、智能体、图文生成等领域，AI每天的进步成果，跟一年前比较，就已是天壤之别。这背后是算力、数据、技术不断进步和开源生态的支撑。 据了解，纳米AI近日在产品迭代上持续发力，继完成从“超级智能体”到“多智能体蜂群”的升级后，仅隔半月再度推出 “纳米P视频”智能体，依托多智能体蜂群的技术能力，构建起国内首个集 “AI 视频生成 - AI 剪辑”于一体的一站式AI影片生成平台，解决了AI

title_i18n.zh: 央视对谈周鸿祎：“先开枪再瞄准”！智能体时代，不懂AI就会被淘汰
title_i18n.en: CCTV Interview with Zhou Hongyi: "Shoot First, Aim Later"! In the era of intelligent agents, those who don't understand AI will be left behind.
title_i18n.es: CCTV entrevista a Zhou Hongyi: "Disparar primero y apuntar después". En la era de los agentes inteligentes, quien no entienda la IA quedará obsoleto.

excerpt_i18n.zh: 当下，人工智能无疑是最热门领域之一。近日，央视《读书》栏目邀请到360集团创始人周鸿祎，围绕人工智能这一核心话题展开深入交流，从日常应用到行业变革，从个人成长到国际竞争，周鸿祎的分享为公众理解AI时代提供了清晰的认知框架。 1、从大模型到智能体：AI的进化与人类的新角色 “过去人们说‘内事不决问张昭，外事不决问周瑜’，现在内外事不决其实可以问一问大模型。”周鸿祎点出了大模型在工作和生活中的核心价值。但要让大模型发挥作用，关键在于精准表达：“到了AI时代，表达能力特别重要，你说得越细节，它给的建议越有效。” 而智能体的出现，让AI从“光说不做”的聊天助理升级为“能落地干活”的数字员工。“大模型是大脑，负责规划推理；智能体是手脚，负责调用工具。”周鸿祎解释，智能体能拆解复杂任务、还有思考和规划的能力，这正是人类解决问题的核心逻辑。 随着智能体普及，人类角色将转变为AI的管理者，人来设定目标、训练模型、评估效果，因此，人的领导力和判断力会成为核心竞争力。 这种转变也带来了人与人之间能力的分化：“无视AI、不懂AI、不会管理智能体的人，注定会被淘汰。”反之，善用AI、能管理100个智能体的人将成为“超级个体”。周鸿祎强调，AI不是威胁，而是个体之间能力的放大器，能让强者更强。   2、AI的进步速度，如同“寒武纪生物大爆炸” 谈及AI的发展速度，周鸿祎用“寒武纪生物大爆炸”形容：“如今在编程、推理、智能体、图文生成等领域，AI每天的进步成果，跟一年前比较，就已是天壤之别。这背后是算力、数据、技术不断进步和开源生态的支撑。 据了解，纳米AI近日在产品迭代上持续发力，继完成从“超级智能体”到“多智能体蜂群”的升级后，仅隔半月再度推出 “纳米P视频”智能体，依托多智能体蜂群的技术能力，构建起国内首个集 “AI 视频生成 - AI 剪辑”于一体的一站式AI影片生成平台，解决了AI
excerpt_i18n.en:
Artificial intelligence is undoubtedly one of the hottest fields today. Recently, CCTV's "Reading" program invited Zhou Hongyi, founder of 360 Group, for an in-depth discussion centered on AI. Covering topics from daily applications to industry transformation, and from personal growth to international competition, Zhou's insights provided the public with a clear framework for understanding the AI era. 

1. From large models to intelligent agents: The evolution of AI and humanity's new role  
Zhou Hongyi noted, "In the past, people said 'for internal matters, consult Zhang Zhao; for external matters, consult Zhou Yu.' Now, for both internal and external matters, one can actually consult large models." He highlighted the core value of large models in work and life. However, the key to making large models effective lies in precise expression: "In the AI era, expressive ability is particularly important. The more detailed your description, the more useful its suggestions will be."  

The emergence of intelligent agents has upgraded AI from a "talk-only" chat assistant to a "task-executing" digital employee. "Large models are the brain, responsible for planning and reasoning; intelligent agents are the hands and feet, responsible for calling tools," Zhou explained. Intelligent agents can break down complex tasks and possess thinking and planning abilities—the core logic of human problem-solving.  

As intelligent agents become widespread, the human role will shift to that of an AI manager: setting goals, training models, and evaluating outcomes. Therefore, human leadership and judgment will become core competencies.  

This shift also brings a divergence in human capabilities: "Those who ignore AI, do not understand AI, or cannot manage intelligent agents are bound to be left behind." Conversely, those who skillfully use AI and can manage 100 intelligent agents will—
excerpt_i18n.es: Actualmente, la inteligencia artificial es sin duda uno de los campos más candentes. Recientemente, el programa de CCTV "Lectura" invitó a Zhou Hongyi, fundador del grupo 360, para un intercambio en profundidad sobre este tema central. Desde aplicaciones cotidianas hasta transformaciones industriales, y desde el crecimiento personal hasta la competencia internacional, las reflexiones de Zhou Hongyi ofrecen un marco claro para comprender la era de la IA. 1. De los grandes modelos a los agentes inteligentes: la evolución de la IA y el nuevo papel de la humanidad. "Antes se decía 'para asuntos internos consulta a Zhang Zhao, para asuntos externos consulta a Zhou Yu', pero ahora tanto los internos como los externos pueden consultarse a los grandes modelos". Zhou Hongyi destacó el valor central de los grandes modelos en el trabajo y la vida. Sin embargo, la clave para que los grandes modelos sean útiles reside en expresarse con precisión.

items.title: AI先行者第一辑：AI for Science 要坚持高压强投入

title_i18n.zh: AI先行者第一辑：AI for Science 要坚持高压强投入

items.title: OpenAI Ramps Up Robotics Work in Race Toward AGI
items.raw_excerpt: The company behind ChatGPT is putting together a team capable of developing algorithms to control robots and appears to be hiring roboticists who work specifically on humanoids.

title_i18n.en: OpenAI Ramps Up Robotics Work in Race Toward AGI
title_i18n.zh: OpenAI加速机器人研发，竞逐通用人工智能。
title_i18n.es: OpenAI intensifica su trabajo en robótica en la carrera hacia la AGI

excerpt_i18n.en: The company behind ChatGPT is putting together a team capable of developing algorithms to control robots and appears to be hiring roboticists who work specifically on humanoids.
excerpt_i18n.zh: ChatGPT背后的公司正在组建一支能够开发控制机器人算法的团队，并招聘专门从事人形机器人研究的机器人专家。
excerpt_i18n.es: La empresa detrás de ChatGPT está formando un equipo capaz de desarrollar algoritmos para controlar robots y parece estar contratando especialistas en robótica que trabajen específicamente con humanoides.

items.title: How people are using ChatGPT
items.raw_excerpt: New research from the largest study of ChatGPT use shows how the tool creates economic value through both personal and professional use. Adoption is broadening beyond early users, closing gaps and making AI a part of everyday life.

title_i18n.en: How people are using ChatGPT
title_i18n.zh: 人们如何使用ChatGPT
title_i18n.es: Cómo está usando la gente ChatGPT

excerpt_i18n.en: New research from the largest study of ChatGPT use shows how the tool creates economic value through both personal and professional use. Adoption is broadening beyond early users, closing gaps and making AI a part of everyday life.
excerpt_i18n.zh: 关于ChatGPT应用的最大规模新研究显示，该工具通过个人与专业用途创造经济价值。其应用正从早期用户向更广泛群体扩展，逐步消除使用鸿沟，使人工智能成为日常生活的一部分。
excerpt_i18n.es: Nueva investigación del mayor estudio sobre el uso de ChatGPT muestra cómo la herramienta crea valor económico tanto en el uso personal como profesional. La adopción se está ampliando más allá de los primeros usuarios, cerrando brechas y haciendo que la IA sea parte de to

items.title: 瓴羊发布企业级营销Agent，破解CMO们的“不可能三角”
items.raw_excerpt: 消费者的注意力分散、人群需求不断细分、投放渠道的割裂，让预算、频次和效果成为营销行业的不可能三角。9月15日，阿里巴巴全资子公司瓴羊正式推出企业级营销Agent，直击营销人长期面临的五大痛点——热点追不上、素材创作慢、战役组织慢、投放拍脑袋、效果难计算，让营销更快、更准、更动人。 瓴羊营销Agent由灵感创意、营销策划、素材创作、媒介投放与结案分析等五大子Agent组成，运行在瓴羊Quick Audience、天攻智投等营销产品上，助力品牌实现“从灵感到落地”的全营销链路智能化，帮助企业建立起一个“AI+人”的超级市场部。   五大子Agent，成企业超级营销天团 企业可根据自身需求，无需搭建工作流，就可以自由组合五个子Agent协作，打造“超级营销天团”，达成营销目标 首先，灵感创意Agent内置“营销日历”，以可视化日历卡片形式整合全网活动热点、大促节点与竞品动态，提前预警高潜力营销机会。它还能根据企业所属行业自动生成定制化创意点子，用户一键确认后，即可联动后续Agent自动推进执行，真正实现“发现即行动”。 营销策划Agent则像是一群赛博策略军师团，快速理解营销活动诉求，自动拆解步骤，依次输出活动主题、人群、机制等完整策划，让营销方案从构思到成型一气呵成，兼具创意与落地性。 有了方案，落地是关键。素材创作Agent只需上传一张产品图，就能在短时间内生成50至100条个性化文案和数十张风格多样的海报，覆盖电商、短信、社交媒体等多种场景，甚至支持动图生成，极大提升内容生产效率。 在投放端，媒介投放Agent让营销人告别“凭感觉投放”。以户外广告为例，它能在1分钟内从全国超360个城市、数千万广告位中，精准筛选出目标人群集中、消费力强的高价值点位，并推荐“人群覆盖浓度≥30%”的优质资源。以会员运营为例，结合瓴羊超信等工具，Agent还可自动生成营销任务画布、批

title_i18n.zh: 瓴羊发布企业级营销Agent，破解CMO们的“不可能三角”
title_i18n.en: Lingyang launches enterprise-level marketing Agent, solving the "impossible trinity" for CMOs.
title_i18n.es: Lingyang lanza un agente de marketing empresarial que resuelve el "triángulo imposible" de los CMO.

excerpt_i18n.zh: 消费者的注意力分散、人群需求不断细分、投放渠道的割裂，让预算、频次和效果成为营销行业的不可能三角。9月15日，阿里巴巴全资子公司瓴羊正式推出企业级营销Agent，直击营销人长期面临的五大痛点——热点追不上、素材创作慢、战役组织慢、投放拍脑袋、效果难计算，让营销更快、更准、更动人。 瓴羊营销Agent由灵感创意、营销策划、素材创作、媒介投放与结案分析等五大子Agent组成，运行在瓴羊Quick Audience、天攻智投等营销产品上，助力品牌实现“从灵感到落地”的全营销链路智能化，帮助企业建立起一个“AI+人”的超级市场部。   五大子Agent，成企业超级营销天团 企业可根据自身需求，无需搭建工作流，就可以自由组合五个子Agent协作，打造“超级营销天团”，达成营销目标 首先，灵感创意Agent内置“营销日历”，以可视化日历卡片形式整合全网活动热点、大促节点与竞品动态，提前预警高潜力营销机会。它还能根据企业所属行业自动生成定制化创意点子，用户一键确认后，即可联动后续Agent自动推进执行，真正实现“发现即行动”。 营销策划Agent则像是一群赛博策略军师团，快速理解营销活动诉求，自动拆解步骤，依次输出活动主题、人群、机制等完整策划，让营销方案从构思到成型一气呵成，兼具创意与落地性。 有了方案，落地是关键。素材创作Agent只需上传一张产品图，就能在短时间内生成50至100条个性化文案和数十张风格多样的海报，覆盖电商、短信、社交媒体等多种场景，甚至支持动图生成，极大提升内容生产效率。 在投放端，媒介投放Agent让营销人告别“凭感觉投放”。以户外广告为例，它能在1分钟内从全国超360个城市、数千万广告位中，精准筛选出目标人群集中、消费力强的高价值点位，并推荐“人群覆盖浓度≥30%”的优质资源。以会员运营为例，结合瓴羊超信等工具，Agent还可自动生成营销任务画布、批
excerpt_i18n.en:
Consumer distraction, increasingly segmented audience demands, and fragmented advertising channels have made budget, frequency, and effectiveness an impossible triangle in the marketing industry. On September 15, Lingyang, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Alibaba, officially launched an enterprise-level marketing Agent, directly addressing five long-standing pain points for marketers: inability to keep up with trends, slow content creation, slow campaign organization, arbitrary ad placement decisions, and difficulty measuring results—making marketing faster, more precise, and more compelling. The Lingyang Marketing Agent consists of five sub-Agents: Inspiration & Creativity, Marketing Planning, Content Creation, Media Placement, and Campaign Analysis & Reporting. It operates on Lingyang's marketing products such as Quick Audience and Tiangang Smart Investment, helping brands achieve end-to-end intelligent marketing "from inspiration to execution" and assisting companies in building a super marketing department powered by "AI + human expertise."

The five sub-Agents form a super marketing team for enterprises. Companies can freely combine these five sub-Agents to collaborate based on their needs without building workflows, creating a "super marketing team" to achieve marketing goals.

First, the Inspiration & Creativity Agent features a "marketing calendar" that integrates online event trends, promotional nodes, and competitor activities in a visual calendar card format, providing early warnings for high-potential marketing opportunities. It also generates customized creative ideas based on the company's industry. With a single click for confirmation, it automatically triggers subsequent Agents to execute, truly enabling "discover and act immediately."

The Marketing Planning Agent functions like a team of cyber strategists, quickly understanding marketing campaign objectives.
excerpt_i18n.es: La dispersión de la atención del consumidor, la creciente segmentación de la demanda y la fragmentación de los canales de difusión han convertido el presupuesto, la frecuencia y la efectividad en el triángulo imposible de la industria del marketing. El 15 de septiembre, Lingyang, filial de Alibaba, lanzó oficialmente su Agente de Marketing empresarial, abordando cinco dolores crónicos del sector: incapacidad de seguir tendencias, lentitud en la creación de materiales, organización lenta de campañas, decisiones de difusión intuitivas y dificultad para medir resultados, haciendo el marketing más rápido, preciso y conmovedor. El Agente de Marketing de Lingyang consta de cinco subagentes: inspiración creativa, planificación de marketing, creación de materiales, difusión mediática y análisis de cierre, operando en productos como Quick Audience y Tiangong Zhitou para potenciar

items.title: Addendum to GPT-5 system card: GPT-5-Codex
items.raw_excerpt: This addendum to the GPT-5 system card shares a new model: GPT-5-Codex, a version of GPT-5 further optimized for agentic coding in Codex. GPT-5-Codex adjusts its thinking effort more dynamically based on task complexity, responding quickly to simple conversational queries or small tasks, while independently working for longer on more complex tasks.

title_i18n.en: Addendum to GPT-5 system card: GPT-5-Codex
title_i18n.zh: GPT-5系统卡附录：GPT-5-Codex
title_i18n.es: Anexo a la tarjeta del sistema GPT-5: GPT-5-Codex

excerpt_i18n.en: This addendum to the GPT-5 system card shares a new model: GPT-5-Codex, a version of GPT-5 further optimized for agentic coding in Codex. GPT-5-Codex adjusts its thinking effort more dynamically based on task complexity, responding quickly to simple conversational queries or small tasks, while independently working for longer on more complex tasks.
excerpt_i18n.zh: 这份GPT-5系统卡附录介绍了一个新模型：GPT-5-Codex，它是GPT-5的优化版本，专为Codex中的代理编码而设计。GPT-5-Codex能根据任务复杂度更动态地调整其思考投入，
excerpt_i18n.es: Este anexo a la tarjeta de sistema GPT-5 presenta un nuevo modelo: GPT-5-Codex, una versión de GPT-5 optimizada para programación agéntica en Codex. GPT-5-Codex ajusta su esfuerzo de razonamiento de forma más dinámica según la complejidad de la tarea,

items.title: 旗舰手机、AI 拍摄眼镜、Flyme ，魅族 22 「归航」终极生态

title_i18n.zh: 旗舰手机、AI 拍摄眼镜、Flyme ，魅族 22 「归航」终极生态
title_i18n.en: Flagship smartphones, AI camera glasses, Flyme, Meizu 22 "Return" ultimate ecosystem.
title_i18n.es: Teléfonos insignia, gafas de fotografía con IA, Flyme, Meizu 22 "Regreso a casa" ecosistema definitivo.
